dcterms:description: Cross-lingual Part-Of-Speech (POS) dataset containing data in 13 languages from the Universal Dependencies v2.3.
dcterms:title: Universal Dependencies v2.3 (Cross-lingual Part-Of-Speech)

dcterms:creator: Yinfei Yang
Yuan Zhang
Chris Tar
Jason Baldridge
dcterms:description: PAWS-X is a paraphrase detection dataset. The authors train on the English data and evaluate the prediction accuracy on the test set translated into 4 other languages.
dcterms:title: PAWS-X

dcterms:creator: Alexis Conneau
Ruty Rinott
Guillaume Lample
Adina Williams
Samuel Bowman
Holger Schwenk
Veselin Stoyanov
dcterms:description: XNLI is a natural language inference dataset in 15 languages. The authors train models on the English MultiNLI training data and evaluate on the other 14.
dcterms:title: XNLI

dcterms:creator: Mikel Artetxe
Holger Schwenk
dcterms:description: Tatoeba is a testbed for parallel sentence identification. The authors select the 14 non-English languages covered by their parallel data.
dcterms:title: Tatoeba
